INCOMING_MSG_MORE: Letter from {{country}} will be arriving {{time}}. Come back soon!
NO_INCOMING_MSG: No incoming letter at this moment.
LOCATION_TIPS: User's location has been randomly adjusted.
NO_PENPALS_MSG: When you started talking with someone, they will be listed here.
MEET_NEW_PAL_TITLE: Ready to meet a new pal?
MEET_NEW_PAL_DESC: Start connecting with the world on SLOWLY!
AUTOMATCH_NO_PALS_FOUND: No targets found. Please refine your criteria or try again later.
AUTOMATCH_FOUND_DESC: They will be added to your friend list.
AUTOMATCH_CONTENT_TOO_SHORT: Your recipients will expect a longer message. Please try making your letter be worth the wait!
AUTOMATCH_FOUND_LOST_DRAFT_MSG: This may be due to a problem that occurred during the last compilation. Would you like to recover?
YOUR_AGE_IS_HIDDEN: Please set your age to public before setting the age filter
AUTOMATCH_NEXT_TRY: Next auto-match will be available in {{time}}
NO_BOOKMARKS_MSG: You can bookmark someone you like and start the chat later.
REACHED_END: The maximum number of results has reached. How about apply a filter?
NO_DRAFTS_MSG: Saving a draft allows you to keep a letter you aren't ready to send yet.
FEEDBACK_THANKYOU: Thank you! We'll reply to your email asap.
CONFIRM_DELETE_ACC: Are you sure you want to deactivate your account?
CONFIRM_DELETE_ACC_MSG: All the data will be lost and may not be able to recover.
PICK_TOPICS: Pick some topics you are interested in.
PICK_TOPICS_MSG: We'll use them to match with others based on common interests.
NO_BLOCKED_MSG: You did not remove any users.
CONFIRM_SHORT_MSG: Your pen friend will expect a longer message. Confirm to send?
CONFIRM_SEND_MSG: This letter takes time to deliver. All sent letters cannot be edited or deleted.
REACHED_FRIENDS_LIMIT: You've reached Pen Friends limit. We're considering to increase the friends limit. Please stay tuned.
HOME_1_MSG: Share your passion with the world!
HOME_2: Your letter will be on its way!
HOME_2_MSG: Mailing time depends on where you & your pen friend live. Will you make your letter be worth the wait?
HOME_3: A nickname & an avatar are all you need.
HOME_3_MSG: Who says a picture is worth a thousand words? Speak your mind & connect freely to the world.
HOME_4: Share your passion with the world.
HOME_4_MSG: Matches based on common interests & languages. Ready to seal your first letter & meet a new pal?
HOME_5_MSG: Discover more than 100 stamps from around the world by talking to new friends or traveling!
HOME_LOGIN: Got an account? Sign in here.
ENTER_PASSWORD_TIPS: You've created a password for this account.
FORGOT_PASSWORD: Forget password? Send one-time passcode to your email.
OLD_PASSWORD_TIPS: Re-tried too many times. Please logout and use the 'Forget Password' to reset your current password.
password_expired: You've tried too many times. Password has expired.
SETUP_PASSWORD_REMINDER: Setup a password for email sign-in
PASSWORD_PATTERN: Minimum 8 characters with at least 1 Alphabet and 1 Number
PASSWORD_NOT_MATCH: New password does not match the confirm password.
NEW_COUNTRY_MSG: You have unlocked something special here.
NEW_STAMP_MSG: Use it to send a letter to your pen friend.
SAY_STH_ABOUT: Say something about yourself or your story...
EDITOR_TIPS: Tap the stamp to select from My Stamps.
EDITOR_TIPS_2: Mailing time depends on where your pen friend lives.
EDITOR_TIPS_3: Will you make your letter be worth the wait?
CONFIRM_REMOVE: Are you sure you want to remove this?
CONFIRM_BLOCK: Are you sure you want to remove this user?
CONFIRM_HIDE: Are you sure you want to hide this user?
ASK_SAVE_DRAFT: Save what you are writing as draft?
REPORT_OFFENSIVE: This person is sending offensive messages
REPORT_OFFENSIVE_PROFILE: This person profile contains offensive content
REPORT_SPAM: This person is sending spammy or advertising messages
REPORT_SPAM_PROFILE: This person profile contains spammy or advertising content
TELL_US_MORE: Tell us more if you want
user_na: User not accepting new friends at this moment.
post_not_found: User not found, draft will be removed
NO_COUNTRY: Sorry, we could not detect a valid country from current location
CONFIRM_CANCEL_SIGNUP_MSG: All the data you entered will be lost.
NICKNAME_LOCKED: Updating gender and nickname has been locked since you met your first pen friend. You are still able to update your avatar anytime.
NICKNAME_LAST_CHANCE: You have only one chance to update your nickname and gender, please think carefully.
REG_TIPS_TERMS: By continuing, you agree to our
REG_TIPS_NAME: Only letters and numbers are allowed
ERR_NAME_EMPTY: Only letters and numbers are allowed
ERR_NAME_EXISTS: The name has already been taken.
Only letters and numbers are allowed
The name has already been taken.
REG_TIPS_LANGS: You may add more than one.
REG_TIPS_GEO: Mailing time depends on where you & your pen friend live. When traveling, you may unlock gifts from different countries!
REG_TIPS_GEO_NO_PERMISSION: Oops! Please allow us to read your location for a better experience.
REG_TIPS_GEO_NO_LOCATION: Cannot get the current location at this moment.
GEO_NO_VALID_LOCATION_BY_TEXT: No valid address found with '{{text}}'. Please try again.
REG_TIPS_NOTIFY: Recommend to turn on notifications for a better experience. You may choose which events to receive notifications in settings.
REG_TIPS_SECURE: Please choose a way to connect with your account.
REG_TIPS_COMPLETE: You've completed your account setup. Let's start writing and meet some new friends!
EMAIL_TIPS: We will send a one-time passcode to your email. The passcode will expire in 15 minutes or after 3 wrong attempts.
VALIDATE_TIPS: Please check your email. The passcode will expire in 15 minutes or after 3 wrong attempts.
EMAIL_RETRY_FAILED_TIPS: You have requested to login recently. Please wait a while before retrying.
The email has already been taken.
retry_too_frequent: You have requested earlier. Please wait a while before retrying.
maintenance_mode: System in maintenance. Please try again later and stay tuned via our official website.
fb_id_exists: Error: Facebook ID linked to another account
g_id_exists: Error: Google ID linked to another account
mobile_exists: Error: Mobile number linked to another account
LETTER_TYPE_OUTDATED: Please update your app to read the full version of this letter.
outdated_version: We have made some great improvements to SLOWLY! Please update your app before continuing.
latest_version: Latest version {{version}} is released! Please update your app.
ACCOUNT_BLOCKED: Your account is temporarily locked. Please contact us for further action.
EXCLUDED_COUNTRIES_DESC: You will be hidden to users who are currently in these locations. You are always visible to existing friends.
SEARCH_COUNTRY_TIPS: Enter a country/region name or ISO code to begin...
NO_HIDDEN_MSG: Hidden users will be removed from the list when they sent a new letter.
TIPS_SHORT_LETTER_TITLE: Ready to send a letter on SLOWLY?
TIPS_SHORT_LETTER_TITLE_WITH_NAME: This is your first letter to {{name}}.
TIPS_SHORT_LETTER_3: Describe who you are and what you do.
TIPS_SHORT_LETTER_5: Choose your favorite stamp & hit Send – that’s it!
TIPS_SHORT_LETTER_1: – make it memorable & interesting! We recommend you to write a longer and more detailed first letter.
TIPS_SHORT_LETTER_LAST: Have fun on SLOWLY. Take your time and make your letter be worth the wait!
SAMPLE_P1: Hej! (This is hello in Danish!) I’m Jens from Copenhagen, Denmark. I’m 24 and I work as a full-time chef – but I also love playing music in my spare time. What kind of music are you into? And what time is it now in Manila? ;) Will be here waiting for your letter! Take care!
SAMPLE_P2: Hi there in Hong Kong! – it’s my first time writing a letter here. I’m a 17-year-old student from Stockholm. Can’t believe that we have so many hobbies in common! – I see that you also like traveling. Have you been to Sweden? I’d love to visit Hong Kong one day. What languages do you speak? Looking forward to hearing from you!
TIPS_SHORT_LETTER_MORE: Need more inspirations? Try these questions:
TIPS_SHORT_LETTER_MORE_Q1: Have you made a pen pal before?
TIPS_SHORT_LETTER_MORE_Q2: Let’s exchange one fun fact about our country/city.
TIPS_SHORT_LETTER_MORE_Q4: How do you say “_______” in your mother tongue?
TIPS_SHORT_LETTER_MORE_Q5: Tell me a secret about you.
TIPS_ACCOUNT_CONNECT: We'll never post without your permission.
MY_REMARK_TIPS: Remarks for {{name}}. Only you can see these remarks.
AT_LEAST_ONE_METHOD: At least one connection method is needed. Please authorize another before disconnecting.
REACHED_ATTACHMENTS_LIMIT_DESC: The number of attachments is limited to 5 per letter.
CONFIRM_SEND_PHOTOSHARING_REQUEST: Are you sure you want to send a photo sharing request? {{name}} will be notified once you confirm.
ONLY_ALLOW_PHOTOS: Photo Sharing must be turned on.
PHOTO_SHARING_TIPS: Photo sharing is only available when both users have accepted the request.
NA_TIPS: {{name}} prefers not to share photos with anyone.
REJECT_ALL_TIPS: You are rejecting all photo sharing requests.
ACCEPT_TIPS: {{name}} want to start sharing photos with you.
CONFIRM_STOP_PHOTOSHARING: Do you want to stop sharing photos?
INACTIVE_USER_TIPS: This account has been deactivated. You could remove {{name}}.
ALLOW_PHOTOS_QUOTA: TIPS: You can share up to {{quota}} photos every {{maxquota}} hours
CONFIRM_CLEAR_PHOTOS: Please confirm to clear all cached images.
CONFIRM_CLEAR_PHOTOS_MSG: This will remove all cached images. If you delete files that are no longer available online, you won't be able to access it.
REACHED_ATTACHMENTS_QUOTA_MSG: Please wait for reset or remove some photos to continue.
NEW_PHOTOREQUEST: New Photo Sharing request has been received.
FRIEND_EXISTS: Error: Friendship exists. You may remove this draft now.
CONFIRM_REMOVE_DOB: Are you sure you want to remove your birthday?
DOB_REMINDER: Adding your birthday will help finding better friends.
DOB_TIPS: You'll have full control over how others view it.
DOB_NO_UPDATE_QUOTA_MSG: You've updated too many times. Please contact us for further assistance.
DOB_CONFIRM_UPDATE: You can only change your birthday for a few times.
DOB_REMINDER_TO_OLD_USERS: You can now add your birthday to your profile!
LOCATION_IS_OFF: Location access permission is turned off.
LOC_UPDATED_RECENTLY: Location has been updated recently. Please try again later.
MANUAL_UPDATE_LOC_CONFIRM: You can set your current location manually for one time only. If you want to update in the future, please turn on the location access permission.
SIGNUP_CLOSE_MSG: Sign-up is temporarily closed. Please try again later.

TIPS_TAP_CAMERA_PHOTOS: Insert photos from Camera or Gallery

NO_TOPICS_FOUND: Oops! No interested topics found. Do you want to add some now?
USER_NOT_ACCEPTING_FRIEND_ATM: {{name}} is not accepting new friends at this moment. Please try again later.
